English:
I really want to know what the cause of this
bizarre illness is.
Chinese:
因為我無論如何都想知道，
那個怪病的原因……
Korean:
…난 꼭 알고 싶어
그 정신 나간 병의 원인을…
German:
Ich will der Ursache dieser seltsamen Krankheit
auf den Grund gehen.

English:
The last time a Digital Wave appeared was in 
Shinjuku, right?
Chinese: 上次發生Digital Shift是在新宿這裡對吧？
Korean: 전에 디지털 시프트가 일어난 곳은, 이곳 신주쿠잖아?
German:
Die letzte digitale Welle ist in Shinjuku
aufgetaucht, nicht wahr?

English:
I wonder if there are any clues around there.
I want to try and search the area.
Chinese:
所以我想在這附近找找看
有沒有什麼線索。
Korean:
단서가 될 만한 게 없는지
이 주변을 살펴보고 싶어
German:
Ich frage mich, ob es dort Hinweise gibt.
Ich möchte die Gegend gerne absuchen.

English:
And for you, the ship has already set sail, no?
Come on, give me a hand.
Chinese:
對你來說也是上了賊船吧？
吶，拜託幫我吧！
Korean:
댁에게 있어서도 그거야, 이미 한 배를 탔다는 거잖아?
댁, 좀 도와줘
German:
Und du steckst in der Sache doch sowieso schon
drin, oder? Na los, hilf mir ein bisschen.

English:
Because we gotta!
Okay, let's go!
Chinese:
這樣才對嘛！
好！那我們走吧！！
German:
Wir müssen das tun!
Okay, also los!
